title: Happy 10th Error-aversary
body:
_Straight to the point:_ You find a match, choose a champion, you are in the loading screen, it reaches a 100%,  you wait and wait until you find yourself being **stuck** in that screen forever, **completely locked out** of your computer **while the game has actually started**, you are **unable to end task** or even exist the lovely game and end up losing the match with a possibility to ruin your precious machine and nerves as a bonus!

Thousands of players are complaining of the same error for the past years, yet - surprisingly? - nothing has been remotely fixed nor effectivly addressed.

And the waiting for a wizard to fix the problem continues ...{{champion:26}}  **Happy Error-versary everyone!**

replies.body: I've had this happen about three times in the last month alone.  Had to restart the computer and log back in, luckily I was able to make it in before 2 minutes - other people have had the same issues in several games this week alone.  For me, though, it started with the change to this horrid new client launcher.  I don't know why they decided to release an untested, unreliable launcher so close to the end of the season but its another dumb decision in a long line - hope they look into it.

Don't restart your machine; hit Ctrl-Alt-Delete and sign out. Then sign back in.

There are also a few methods of killing a process with a key combination. See here for more: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/y0fp2AoA-early-surrender-should-not-be-optional-after-this-client-update?comment=0002

There are ways to interact with the Task Manager even though the loading screen is stuck on the screen. 

Once it's up you can Alt+Tab to it even though it wont show on screen and use the arrow keys to move to the process of that is not responding and then hit the Delete or End key to terminate the process.
